Name: The CLASSLA-StanfordNLP model for named entity recognition of non-standard Slovenian 1.0
Description: This model for named entity recognition of non-standard Slovenian was built with the CLASSLA-StanfordNLP tool by training on the ssj500k training corpus and the Janes-Tag training corpus, using the CLARIN.SI-embed.sl word embeddings. The training corpora were additionally augmented for handling missing diacritics by repeating parts of the corpora with diacritics removed. The model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
